name: BreadOut
description:
A bread themed Breakout clone done for the Godot Wild Jam #26

Controls:

Paddle (breadstick) Follows mouse (once ball (bread roll) is launched)
Launch Ball (Bread Roll) by left clicking

Increasing Difficulty increases the speed the ball (bread roll) gains whenever a Block (Loaf) is destroyed. But it also increases the score gained from "Streaks" ( taking out multiple blocks (loaves) within a 2 seconds of each other)
